casebody.data:
Patsy SALVATORE, Petitioner-Appellee, v. Jerome G. LOCKE, as Deputy Commissioner, United States Employees’ Compensation Commission, Second Compensation District, Defendant-Appellee, John T. Clark & Son, Employer, and Fidelity & Casualty Company of New York, Insurance Carrier, Defendants-Appellants. No. 32. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 5, 1934. Alexander, Ash & Jones, of New York City (Lawson R. Jones, Edward Ash, and Paul R. James, all of New York City, of counsel), for appellants. Jerome G. Locke, Deputy Com’r, pro se.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS' N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (6 F. Supp. 560) affirmed on the authority of Crowell v. Benson, 285 U. S. 22, 52 S. Ct. 285, 76 L. Ed. 598.
